definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: LXX mostly )Iwanan, )Iwnan (´[[י]] hath been gracious, cf. [[אֶלְחָנׇן]] [[חֲנַנְאֵל]] & reff.; also Ph. [[יחנבעל בעליחן]])—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: high priest Ezr 10:6 = [[יוֹחָנׇן]] Ne 12:22, Ne 12:23 appar. = [[יוֹנׇתָן]] Ne 12:11, Ne 12:11 (LXX )Iwnaqan).
´[[יְהוֹ]] son of Tobiah Ne 6:18 (LXX Codd. )Iwnaqan).
´[[יְהוֹ]] porter in David's time 1Ch 26:3 (LXX )Iwnav, LXXL ) Iwnaqan).

´[[יוֹ]] (& so all foll.) a Jewish captain, after fall of Jerus. 2Ki 25:23, Je 40:8, Je 40:13, Je 40:15, Je 40:16, Je 41:11, Je 41:13, Je 41:14, Je 41:15, Je 41:16, Je 42:1, Je 42:8, Je 43:2, Je 43:4, Je 43:5
eldest son of king Josiah 1Ch 3:15 LXXL )Iwaxav (appar. = [[יְתוֹאָחָז]] 2Ki 23:30 + ).
a post-exilic prince of the line of David 1Ch 3:24.
father of Azariah, priest in Sol.'s time 1Ch 6:9, 1Ch 6:10.
